params.migrationEndBlock_: Migration end block of masterChef. (must be same to masterChef's one)
params.startBlock_: Start block of masterChef. (must be same to masterChef's one)

harvest(address).details: Harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingCla(address).return: Pending CLA reward for a given user.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: CLA MasterChef of CLS. distribute CLA tokens to CLS holders * References: * - https://github.com/sushiswap/sushiswap/blob/canary/contracts/MasterChefV2.sol

claPerBlock().notice: Number of tokens created per block.

claPerBlocks(uint256,uint256).notice: Number of tokens created between the given _from to _to blocks.

pendingCla(address).notice: View function to see pending CLA.

updatePool().notice: Update accumulated reward per block of the pool.
